name: Capitalized Name of the Hero lie in-game
classType: lowercased name of the class, from the following: knight,thief,warrior,weaver,mage,ranger,material
element: lowercased name of the element, from the following: fire,earth,ice,light,dark
zodiac: lowercased name of the zodiac sign, from the following: aries,taurus,gemini,cancer,leo,virgo,libra,scorpio,sagittarius,capricorn,aquarius,pisces
specialtyChangeName: lowercased name of the hero on his specialty change, spaces as dashes
selfSkillBarName: lowercased name of hero's self skill bar, if any (e.g. Fighting Spirit, Focus). Otherwise empty
background: Text just like the background found in-game
If has other paragraphs, add each new paragraph as a new string inside this Array

relations.relationType: lowercased name of the relation type, from the following: trust, grudge, rival, longing

relations.hero: lowercased name of another relation hero
